com.lucaslouca.util

Interface LLTownMap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LLTownMapImpl

    public interface LLTownMap
    The LLTownMap interface represents a map that stores towns using a LLDirectedGraph underneath.

    It wraps the functionality of LLDirectedGraph and provides methods for accessing it using the town names.

    • Method Summary
